text:
Hi,

We seem to have an issue when data is being extracted in a word or PDF that certain pages that have been inserted using MS Field Control are being dropped.  Doesn't throw an error, it extracts every other page but the ones inserted using MS field Control.
creator: raymond.cabrera@brainhunter.com
apache@gagravarr.org
text: Which extraction? What code in Apache POI are you calling? Do you have an example file that shows up the problem?

Created attachment 33298
.doc example of MS Field Control insert not being extracted

Example of file requested
creator: raymond.cabrera@brainhunter.com

text: Thanks for the file. How are you calling Apache POI though? Any chance of a short code snippet and/or junit unit test to show how to reproduce the problem?
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
raymond.cabrera@brainhunter.com
